body.query: CREATE TABLE users (id INT, name VARCHAR, email VARCHAR, age INT, active BOOLEAN)
INSERT INTO users VALUES (id="1", name="John Doe", email="john@example.com", age="30", active="true")
INSERT INTO users VALUES (id="2", name="Jane Smith", email="jane@example.com", age="25", active="true")
INSERT INTO users VALUES (id="3", name="Bob Wilson", email="bob@example.com", age="35", active="false")
INSERT INTO users VALUES (id="4", name="Alice Brown", email="alice@example.com", age="28", active="true")
CREATE TABLE products (id INT, name VARCHAR, price INT, stock INT, available BOOLEAN)
INSERT INTO products VALUES (id="101", name="Laptop", price="1200", stock="15", available="true")
INSERT INTO products VALUES (id="102", name="Wireless Mouse", price="25", stock="50", available="true")
INSERT INTO products VALUES (id="103", name="Mechanical Keyboard", price="80", stock="0", available="false")
INSERT INTO products VALUES (id="104", name="4K Monitor", price="350", stock="8", available="true")
INSERT INTO products VALUES (id="105", name="Bluetooth Headphones", price="120", stock="20", available="true")
CREATE TABLE orders (order_id INT, user_id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT, total_price INT)
INSERT INTO orders VALUES (order_id="1001", user_id="1", product_id="101", quantity="1", total_price="1200")
INSERT INTO orders VALUES (order_id="1002", user_id="2", product_id="102", quantity="2", total_price="50")
INSERT INTO orders VALUES (order_id="1003", user_id="1", product_id="104", quantity="1", total_price="350")
CREATE TABLE logs (log_id INT, user_id INT, action VARCHAR, created_at TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO logs VALUES (log_id="1", user_id="1", action="login", created_at="2024-01-15T10:30:00Z")
INSERT INTO logs VALUES (log_id="2", user_id="1", action="view_product", created_at="2024-01-15T10:35:00Z")
INSERT INTO logs VALUES (log_id="3", user_id="2", action="login", created_at="2024-01-15T11:00:00Z")
INSERT INTO logs VALUES (log_id="4", user_id="1", action="purchase", created_at="2024-01-15T10:40:00Z")
CREATE TABLE employees (emp_id INT, name VARCHAR, department VARCHAR, salary INT, hired_at TIMESTAMP)
INSERT INTO employees VALUES (emp_id="1001", name="David Lee", department="Engineering", salary="90000", hired_at="2022-03-15T09:00:00Z")
INSERT INTO employees VALUES (emp_id="1002", name="Sarah Kim", department="Marketing", salary="75000", hired_at="2021-06-01T09:00:00Z")
INSERT INTO employees VALUES (emp_id="1003", name="Michael Park", department="Engineering", salary="95000", hired_at="2020-01-20T09:00:00Z")

추가_EXPLAIN_쿼리_예제.query_parameter: EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM users WHERE active="true"
EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM orders WHERE user_id="1"
EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM logs WHERE action="login"
EXPLAIN SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department="Engineering"

개별_curl_테스트.CREATE: curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/tables/create -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"query": "CREATE TABLE test (id INT)"}'
개별_curl_테스트.INSERT: curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/tables/insert -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"query": "INSERT INTO test VALUES (id=\"1\")"}'
